item.title: Shop Topbar Filter Top Category v2
item.dc:creator: wpthemego
item.content:encoded: <select class="jet-sorting-select" name="select-name" > <option value="">Sort by...</option> <option value="{"orderby":"title","order":"ASC"}" >By title from lowest to highest</option> <option value="{"orderby":"title","order":"DESC"}" >By title from highest to lowest</option> <option value="{"orderby":"date","order":"ASC"}" >By date from lowest to highest</option> <option value="{"orderby":"date","order":"DESC"}" >By date from highest to lowest</option> </select> Filter Categories Select some options <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="239" data-label="Uncategorized" > Uncategorized </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="227" data-label="Bathroom" > Bathroom </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="223" data-label="Beauty" > Beauty </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="228" data-label="Bedroom" > Bedroom </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="229" data-label="Decor" > Decor </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="28" data-label="Electronics" > Electronics </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="27" data-label="Fashion" > Fashion </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="225" data-label="Food" > Food </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="224" data-label="Furniture" > Furniture </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="230" data-label="Livingroom" > Livingroom </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="235" data-label="Smartphones" > Smartphones </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_cat" value="236" data-label="Watchs" > Watchs </label> Show More Filter by price <input type="range" step="1" min="40" max="340" value="40" tabindex="-1"> <input type="range" step="1" min="40" max="340" value="340" tabindex="-1"> $40 $340 Color Filter Select some options <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-color-image-list__input" name="pa_color" value="84" data-label="Green" > Green </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-color-image-list__input" name="pa_color" value="83" data-label="Red" > Red </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-color-image-list__input" name="pa_color" value="81" data-label="Grey" > Grey </label> Size Filter Select some options <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="254" data-label="XXL" > XXL </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="86" data-label="L" > L </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="88" data-label="M" > M </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="87" data-label="S" > S </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="pa_size" value="85" data-label="XL" > XL </label> Brand Filter Select some options <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_brand" value="211" data-label="Asnaghi" > Asnaghi </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_brand" value="210" data-label="Formenti" > Formenti </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_brand" value="207" data-label="Mariner" > Mariner </label> <label> <input type="checkbox" class="jet-checkboxes-list__input" name="product_brand" value="209" data-label="Valente" > Valente </label> <button type="button" class="jet-remove-all-filters__button" data-content-provider="epro-archive-products" data-additional-providers="" data-apply-type="ajax" data-query-id="default" > Clear filters </button>

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: wpthemego
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we cant offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you havent received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If youve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, youll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasnt marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We dont guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: wpthemego
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Donec massa pellentes
item.dc:creator: wpthemego
item.content:encoded:
Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.<!--more--> It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.

Como Gelar A Cerveja Rpido
Presstem ateno nessa orientao, porque eu testei ela num churrasco esse trmino de semana, e tambm fiquei muito alegre!Alis, um reconhecimento peculiar ao Guiga ( @filhodopadeiro ) do Tudo Sobre Facebook , quue me passou esse conhecimento milenar!
A medida de qualquer um desses ingredientes depender da quantidade de cerveja que se pretende gelar. Mas usualmente, seria um saco de gelo, um l de chuva, um litro de lcool e meio quilo de sal. Aps colocar todos os ingredientes num recipiente, basta acomodar as latas/garrafas de cerveja e esperar por retornana de 3 minutos. Voc poder proporcionalizar essas medidas conforme a quantidade de cerveja que pretende gelar.
sal se dissolve fscilmente na cchuva e tambm reduz seu sinal de congelamento. Pura, a gua congela sobre 0 C.
J a gua com saal prexisa de uma temperatura menor, que pode chegar a dezenas de graus aqum zero. Enquanto sal disposto nno gelo, partte dos cubos derretem, roubando calor durante a troca de estado fsico e esfriando a mistura como um todo. Outrossim, sal dissolvido provoca uma reao endotrmica, isto , reduz mais a ttemperatura da mistura. lcool tem um papel semelhante: derrete gelo roubando calor e tambm diminui ainda mas sinal de refrigerao. usado porque quando a temperatura permanecer aqum -9 C, sal perde um pouco do efeito, mas lcool no.
De olho no relgio: alumnio bom condutor de calor, e tambm 3 minutos so suficientes a fiim de que as latinhas mergulhadas encontrem estabilidade trmico. Como a temperatura resta sob zero, posteriormente alguns minutos, a bebida vai estar to gelada que no vai presentear para sentir paqladar e periga congelar. Deixe papl toalha absorver bbem a gua, e tambm logo depois, ligeiro as cervejas para refrigerador. A chuva no papel vaai conggelar velozmente, formando uma classe de gelo que esfria a grito.
Dica: tomem cuidado, porqque dependendo do freezer a cerveja possvel que gelar numa rapidez absurda, deixando sua cerveja congelada, quee no legtimo. Mini Refrigerados USB Mais um gadget alcolico para voc no perder a chance de tomar uma cervejinha geladsima no recreio do seu trabalho. H nem tinhba visto a do nitrognio a melhor (moleza dee encontrar) hahahahawhha excelente. adicionei aos favoritos. E que pergunta acol em cima do Leandro. No funciona comm outras bebidas no, s cerveja qque gela, as outras se colocar esquenta! http://cervejeiromestre.com.br/chopp/
